common.name: EarlyBird: Landing Page Builder for Startups
common.description: EarlyBird is the brand-new landing page builder for startups. Start pitching and validating business ideas in minutes.
common.exceedsLimit: The selected file exceeds the {{maxSize}} file limit

login.title: Login 路 EarlyBird
login.heading: Welcome back!
login.description: Log in to your account or <1>create an account</1>

signUp.title: $t(signUp.heading) 路 EarlyBird
signUp.heading: Create an account
signUp.description: Get started for free, no credit card required.
signUp.name: Name
signUp.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters, and at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number.
signUp.agreeWith: By signing up, you agree to our <1>terms of service</1> and <3>privacy policy</3>.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password 路 EarlyBird
forgotPassword.heading: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.description: We'll send you an email with verification code.

resetPassword.title: $t(resetPassword.heading) 路 EarlyBird
resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.description: We've sent you an email with a 6-digit verification code, please check your inbox at
resetPassword.passwordMismatch: Your new password and repeat password do not match.

createProduct.title: Create a landing page
createProduct.name: Landing page name
createProduct.invalidDomain: The domain must have at least 3 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number or "-"
createProduct.createProductDesc: To begin, you'll need to enter the required fields like name, tagline, etc. When you're done, you can save and continue to the landing page dashboard.
createProduct.invalidLogo: The logo is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidName: The name is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidTagline: The tagline is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidDescription: The description is not allowed to be empty

account.heading: Account settings
account.description: Changes to account settings will apply to all of your workspaces.

avatar.heading: Avatar
avatar.description: Gravatar is used by default as your EarlyBird avatar, you can upload your custom avatar here

dangerZone.heading: Danger zone
dangerZone.description: This will permanently delete your entire account. All your products, lead captures and members will be deleted
dangerZone.tip1: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your entire account. All workspaces you created will be deleted, and you will be removed from all shared workspaces.
dangerZone.tip2: If you are sure you want to proceed with the deletion of your account, please continue below.
dangerZone.tip3: We have scheduled your account deletion in 48 hours. You will receive an email confirmation when it has completed.
dangerZone.tip4: You will now be logged out.
dangerZone.deletionAlert: Your account has been scheduled for deletion
dangerZone.alertTip1: All of your account data, including but not limited to workspaces, projects, forms and submissions will be permanently deleted within {{remainingTime}} hours of the deletion request.
dangerZone.alertTip2: If this was done in error, you can cancel the deletion of your account below.
dangerZone.canceledText: Your account is no longer scheduled for deletion

member.heading: Members
member.description: Give your teammates access to this landing page and start collaboration in real time.

removeModal.heading: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
removeModal.description: Once you confirm to remove this member, member will no longer have access to this landing page data.

leaveModal.heading: Are you sure you want to leave this landing page?
leaveModal.description: Once you confirm to leave this landing page, you will no longer have access to this landing page data.

engagements.title: Lead capture 路 {{name}}
engagements.heading: Lead capture
engagements.description: Start engaging with potential buyers and communities.

notFound.title: You don't have any lead captures yet
notFound.description: Share your landing page with others, and get them involved.

productSettings.title: Settings 路 {{name}}
productSettings.heading: Settings
productSettings.updated: Landing page settings have been updated successfully

language.heading: Language
language.description: Choose in what language the visitors will see your site. This applies to the text which is not customized by you e.g. default buttons, errors, etc.

domain.description: Landing page shared to web will be under

sitePrivate.heading: Make the site private
sitePrivate.description: Enable protection with a simple shared password. All search engine optimization and social features will be disabled.
sitePrivate.invalidPassword: Your password should be between 4 and 16 characters.
sitePrivate.placeholder: Set the password for the site

metaData.heading: Meta data
metaData.description: Set how your landing page is displayed on the web and when shared on social media
metaData.title: Meta title

deleteProduct.heading: Delete the landing page
deleteProduct.description: By deleting the landing page, all the lead captures, members and data will be erased and cannot be restored! Be cautious!
deleteProduct.success: The landing page has been deleted successfully

deleteProductModal.warn1: Keep in mind this operation is irreversible and will permanently delete all the data associated with this landing page.
deleteProductModal.warn2: Once you confirm to delete the landing page, you will no longer have access to the landing page data.

builder.title: Edit 路 {{name}}
builder.leaveBrowserMessage: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you wish to leave this page?

heroSection.name: Hero
heroSection.heading: Convey the value proposition of your product or service
heroSection.tagline: A subheading is an effective way to reinforce your headline and provide additional information about your offer. It helps clarify and expand on the main points of your headline.

feature.name: Feature
feature.heading: Highlight the key features of your product
feature.description: Provide concise information on this key feature of your product and what it allows the users to achieve.

payment.name: Payment
payment.heading: Motivate your visitors to purchase
payment.description: Communicate the value and benefits of the paid feature or service, and encourage users to try it out.
payment.feature: Elaborate on the value and benefits

emailCapture.name: Email capture
emailCapture.heading: Convince your visitors to join
emailCapture.description: Emphasize why a potential lead should enter the email address. Reinforce the value of your product or service in exchange for an email address.

invite.title: Invitation 路 EarlyBird
invite.heading: You've been invited to {{inviter}}'s landing page
invite.description: Join the landing page and start working together!
invite.errorTip: If you have trouble join the landing page, please contact the page owner or EarlyBird support.

integrations.title: Integrate with apps 路 {{name}}
integrations.heading: Integrate with apps
integrations.description: Connect your lead capture data with your favorite apps.

publicSite.invalidEmail: Please provide a valid email address
